content:
[if]
	[module]
		`[dead tower]`
		`[dungeon]`
		`[war room]`
	[/module]
	[attack type]
		`physical`
	[attack condition]
		`counter`
	[attack success]
		1
	[cooltime]
		1000
[/if]


[then]
	[target]
		`myself`-1
	[probability]
		100
	[equipment duration]
		1000
	[appendage]
		334
[/then]


[if]
	[my appendage]
		334
	[change status]
		`hp`
		`>`
		`%`	0
		`end`
	[cooltime]
		1000
[/if]


[then]
	[target]
		`myself`-1
	[equipment duration]
		1000
	[stat]
		`equipment physical attack`
		`%`50
[/then]
